name: Adolfo
description:
This is Malarkey Studio's first project.  This is made in my spare time, I create the assets and program the game so I truly hope you enjoy it.  Any feedback whether positive or constructive is welcome.

  • Adolfo is a top-down shooter bullet hell game featuring swarms, boss fight, and power ups. 
  • Players build in-game currency as they play and can purchase characters and and upgrade in the store.
  • The game keeps track of player's stats and awards them titles.
  • As of right now there is a basic story.
  • There are two modes:
    • Story Mode - 10 waves and a boss.  Introductory dialogue and ending sequence.
    • Infinity Run -See how long you can last.

Feel free to hit me up on twitter (@MalarkeyStudio) or follow!
